press_button.description: Press the button to turn on the lamp.

rotate_lamp_head.description: Rotate the lamp head to adjust the direction of light.

clean_lamp_button.description: Clean the button to ensure its smooth functionality.

clean_lamp_head.description: Clean the lamp head to maintain its appearance and performance.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to ensure stability and performance.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the button, head, and lamp base.
